alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 4:03PM CDT until June 21 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ovilla, or near Glenn Heights, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Grand Prairie, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Palmer, Oak Leaf, Cedar Hill State Park, Pecan Hill, Ike and Joe Pool Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 393 and 419. Interstate 20 between mile markers 460 and 468. Interstate 45 between mile markers 258 and 268. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
